items.author: Tazmadre

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater, Order a Smaller Size
items.body: This sweater is beautiful and soft. I love the shade of green, itâ€™s perfect year round but especially for the holiday season. I deducted one star because the sweater is not true to size, it is very generously sized. Iâ€™m currently a womenâ€™s US 16, I ordered an XL, I need to go down a size, probably 2 sizes. It may be hard to tell in my photos but itâ€™s hanging off me. The photo I attached with a yellow sweater on top is for comparison to another XL short sleeve sweater I own. I think my yellow sweater runs larger than most of my sweaters and this green sweater is even larger than that. I estimate this is about 6â€ larger around and 1-2 inches longer than I expected for an XL. If I had sized down 1-2 sizes, I think it would be very flattering with some extra fabric and drape to hide your tummy (based on the shape I think this would be forgiving around the waist even in a smaller size, it has stretch and drapes). If you prefer really loose fitting clothing, order your normal size, if you want something more true to size then I strongly recommend sizing down. Read more
items.author: Legally Brunette

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best quality
items.body: The quality is not that great but for the price I decided to keep it. Not worth the full price. It runs a little large so take that into consideration. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft
items.body: Much softer than I expected fits very nice. Will be ordering it in another color. Great for Arizona weather. Read more
items.author: Lisa Reichert

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buttery soft and comfortable
items.body: I love this top much more than I thought I would. Iâ€™ll start by saying itâ€™s probably the most comfortable one I now own. I hosted Thanksgiving dinner and wore it all day. Took off my apron to sit down for the meal and felt dressed up enough to be festive. Meant to take a picture that day, but was too busy & forgot. Itâ€™s a â€œsweaterâ€, but did not feel like one. I never once got hot - at my age, thatâ€™s saying something! It has the most buttery soft feel to it. I am surprised at the quality for the price, Iâ€™d like to get another in a different color. Iâ€™m 5â€™10, 170lbs, ordered a large, and the length was great. Most tops run short on me. Form fitting without feeling tight or restrictive in any way. Read more
items.author: kgard

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable Lightweight Pointelle Sweater. Soft, Pretty, and a Great Closet Staple
items.body: I grabbed this adorable lightweight short-sleeve sweater with a crewneck, and I am so glad I did. It is absolutely adorable in person. The material is soft, cozy, and has a really pretty pointelle knit design as you see in the pictures. Little diamond shapes with delicate openwork detailing. Because of that open knit, the sweater has slight sheerness in the patterned areas. Itâ€™s not overly see-through, but with the black color I ordered, my nude bra did show through a bit. A black bra fixes that completely, and for lighter colors a nude bra will work best. Just something to keep in mind depending on how much coverage you like. One thing I really love is that this top can be worn on its own or layered. Even though itâ€™s short sleeve, it would be adorable over a fitted cap-sleeve top with a collar peeking out. That would give it a sweet, preppy vibe without adding bulk. Fit-wise, itâ€™s feminine, flattering, and has a soft, slightly vintage feel. Itâ€™s lightweight without feeling thin, and perfect for pairing with jeans, trousers, or a skirt. The quality is lovely for the price. Overall, this is a really pretty and versatile sweater. Just be mindful of the open-knit detailing if you prefer more coverage underneath. ðŸ˜Š Read more
items.author: Chelle Lyn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin and delicate
items.body: Beautiful and amazingly soft women's sweaters. This is a thin, short sleeve sweater. Definitely not for very cold weather. It is delicate, but made well. But, both the knitted patterns, color, and softness make up for that. Many beautiful colors to choose from. Ordered a large, fits perfect. See pictures for measurements. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Classic White, Purple, Apricot, Royal Blue, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
